mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promoreply (rno, bno, writer,content) VALUES (promoreply_seq.NEXTVAL,#{bno},#{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT pr.*, u.filenum FROM promoreply pr LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON pr.writer = u.userid WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno DESC ) tbl )
